title: My Dungeons Are Popular - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Mystery   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Alternate World   Artificial Intelligence   Artists   Battle Competition   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Clones   College/University   Confident Protagonist   Curious Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Dreams   Dungeons   Enemies Become Allies   Fanfiction   Fantasy Creatures   Fast Learner   Futuristic Setting   Gate to Another World   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Magical Technology   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Nightmares   Parallel Worlds   Programmer   Reincarnation   Spatial Manipulation   Special Abilities   Stoic Characters   Survival Game   Transmigration   Virtual Reality   World Travel
author: Sister's Bride   姐姐的新娘
description:
This is a strange world where everyone can build Dream Dungeons.

Qiu Ren also becomes one of the many Dream Makers.

So, welcome to the dream I built.

You can experience the thrill of being the winner in “Battle Royale;”

Seek salvation in “Dark Souls;”

Slaughter the gods wantonly in “God of War.”

Lastly… some dreams are very harmful to your body. Please don’t be too addicted to them.>
